title: Looking to Upgrade my N172 Radbourn
author: Jason Carota

posts.post_title: Looking to Upgrade my N172 Radbourn
posts.post_content:
Interested in a bit of a condition upgrade. All text and borders visible with a less faded image is what I'm trying for.  My only request is that the card is not skinned or re-backed.  Rough borders, tack holes, staining, etc. are fine with me.

What I currently have:

[IMG]https://net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1556&pictureid=37100[/IMG]


Thanks for looking!
Hi how much are you looking to sell your current radbourn?
I would also be interested if for sale
Thank for the replies.  I plan on keeping the current Radbourn.
